title: Drawing, "Studies of Trees and Plants seen from the Rio Magdalena, Columbia", 1853
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at upper right center: Tree with / greenish yellow flowers / massed all over; again, at lower center: Guaimaro [ not written by C.] - Whitish green color like / poplar somewhat.  Bark very white grey; and at lower right: Branches some- / thing like the oak. / Leaves [design] hard and / shiny deep green.
description: Horizontal view containing a group of trees and plants at upper left; a two trees at right of upper center; a tree at lower center; and a tree at lower right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Studies of Trees and Plants seen from the Rio Magdalena, Columbia", 1853.
1853. Graphite on gray wove paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-135.
